summary: Health monitoring app with login authentication and Bluetooth device connectivity for recording health metrics every 2 minutes and exporting as timestamped CSV files
architectural_notes: Health metrics dashboard with data visualization
CSV export functionality with timestamp-based file naming
Bluetooth API integration for device connectivity

existing_features.title: Add a login page that appears before the main health dashboard, requiring users to authenticate via Internet Identity before accessing the application
Add UI controls to request Bluetooth device connection with a clear button or interface element that triggers the browser's Bluetooth pairing dialog
Implement Web Bluetooth API integration to scan for and connect to nearby Bluetooth devices when user initiates pairing

new_feature_requests.summary: Record health data every 2 minutes and export as timestamped CSV files
